entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Bowen Island. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
